author: Katherine He
testimonial: Code Penguin connects eager learners and amazing teachers  together to solve and create coding projects through Holochain.

author: Sandy Yeung
testimonial: Revolutionary code sharing decentralized, peer-to-peer medium for code sharing.

author: Evan Ross
testimonial: A more human internet to better control how and with whom we interact with.  In order to evolve and thrive, this community support everyone's uniqueness.

author: Cefi Menda
testimonial: Installation and actually deployment was super simple and even more important it delivered on what they promised, it worked.
